Keywords: Animal , Generation X , X-Men

Special Powers
IT'S KINDA GROSS...: FREE: Generate an Eany or Meany bystander, unless Maggott's bystander of that name has been KO'd. Each has [MAX 1].
...BUT IT'S HOW I LIVE: FREE: Remove an adjacent Eany or Meany bystander from the map. If you do, remove all of that bystander's Food tokens and give them to Maggott.
MY DIGESTION IS...WEIRD: FREE: Remove a Food token and choose one: Heal 2 clicks -or- This turn, Maggott can use Charge and and modifies his combat values +1.
